introduction: SYNOPSISMin Se-hyung suffers a car accident while on a trip with his wife Hye-mi. As a result, he is paralyzed and unable to perform in bed. The couple tries to overcome the physical pain through their spiritual love. One day, drunk Se-hyung spends a night with a hostess. In the morning, she is discovered dead and he is falsely charged with murder. The reporter Jin-wu assigned to this case is an old college classmate who was in love with Hye-mi back in their school days. Witnessing Hye-mi's misfortune, Jin-wu feels compassion for her. Jin-wu discloses that Se-hyung is impotent therefore innocent of the murder. Though his innocence is proven, Se-hyung falls into a great feeling of defeat. Se-hyung and Hye-mi decide to separate. Resolved to get a divorce, Se-hyung goes to see Hye-mi where he witnesses Jin-wu and Hae-mi together. He drives manically and gets into a car accident. Through surgery, Se-hyung regains his sexual functions.
